sources.title: 1957 - The Brothers Rico - Los hermanos Rico - Phil Karlson - VO
1957 - The Brothers Rico - Los hermanos Rico - Phil Karlson - VOSE
The Brothers Rico (1957)
sources.description: Eddie Rico, the erstwhile bookkeeper for a big Mafia boss, is now making a living as an honest merchant in Florida with his family. Things go sour when the police start a search for his syndicate-linked brothers who are on the lam after a big hit, forcing Eddie to get involved with the Mafia again. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-brothers-rico-1957/

metadata.Plot: Eddie Rico, the erstwhile bookkeeper for a big Mafia boss, is now making a living as an honest merchant in Florida with his family. Things go sour when the police start a search for his syndicate-linked brothers who are on the lam after a big hit, forcing Eddie to get involved with the Mafia again.
metadata.Writer: Lewis Meltzer, Ben Perry, Georges Simenon
metadata.Actors: Richard Conte, Dianne Foster, Kathryn Grant
